thread.title: BRIEF-Guaranty Bancshares Says Transferred Recordkeeping And Custodial Services To Newport Group

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guaranty Bancshares Says Transferred Recordkeeping And Custodial Services To Newport Group

organizations.name: brief-guaranty bancshares says transferred recordkeeping and custodial services to newport group feb

text:
February 7, 2018 / 11:29 AM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Guaranty Bancshares Says Transferred Recordkeeping And Custodial Services To Newport Group Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Guaranty Bancshares Inc: 
* GUARANTY BANCSHARES SAYS TRANSFERRED RECORDKEEPING AND CUSTODIAL SERVICES FOR CO TO NEWPORT GROUP INC EFFECTIVE JAN 2 - SEC FILING 
* GUARANTY BANCSHARES - DUE TO TRANSFER, PARTICIPANTS ARE TEMPORARILY UNABLE TO MAKE A WITHDRAWAL, OBTAIN A DISTRIBUTION, AMONG OTHERS 
* GUARANTY BANCSHARES - BLACKOUT PERIOD FOR PLAN BEGAN AT 3:00 P.M. CENTRAL TIME ON DEC 20, 2017, WAS ORIGINALLY EXPECTED TO END NO LATER THAN FEB 2 
* GUARANTY BANCSHARES - ON FEB 6, CO DELIVERED NOTICE TO DIRECTORS, EXECUTIVE OFFICERS INFORMING ABOUT BLACKOUT PERIOD BEING EXTENDED TO FEB 12 
* GUARANTY BANCSHARES - BLACKOUT PERIOD EXTENDED FOR SUFFICIENT TIME TO CORRECT OPERATIONAL ERRORS RELATED TO RECORDKEEPING, CUSTODIAL SERVICES TRANSFER Source text : ( bit.ly/2sdCTcR ) Further company coverage:
